content:
SystemFonts Class

In this Article

Contains properties that expose the system resources that concern fonts.

Syntax

Declaration

public static class SystemFonts

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • System.Object
  • SystemFonts

Inherited Members

,

,

,

,

Properties summary

CaptionFontFamily

Gets the metric that determines the font family of the caption of the nonclient area of a nonminimized window.
CaptionFontFamilyKey

Gets the ResourceKey for the stem.Windows.SystemFonts.CaptionFontFamily* property.

    Gets the ResourceKey for the stem.Windows.SystemFonts.StatusFontStyle* property.

    public static System.Windows.ResourceKey StatusFontStyleKey { get; }

    Property Value

    • ResourceKey

      A resource key.

    Remarks

    XAML Attribute Usage

    <object property="{ { SystemFonts.StatusFontStyleKey}}"/>

  • StatusFontTextDecorations

    Gets the metric that determines the decorations of the text used in status bars and ToolTips for the nonclient area of a nonminimized window.

    public static System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection StatusFontTextDecorations { get; }

    Property Value

    • TextDecorationCollection

      A collection of text decoration.

    Remarks

    Obtain the metric from SPI_GETNONCLIENTMETRICS. See SystemParametersInfo.

    XAML Attribute Usage

    <object property="{ SystemFonts.StatusFontTextDecorations}"/>

  • StatusFontTextDecorationsKey

    Gets the ResourceKey for the stem.Windows.SystemFonts.StatusFontTextDecorations* property.

    public static System.Windows.ResourceKey StatusFontTextDecorationsKey { get; }

    Property Value

    • ResourceKey

      A resource key.

    Remarks

    XAML Attribute Usage

    <object property="{ { SystemFonts.StatusFontTextDecorationsKey}}"/>

  • StatusFontWeight

    Gets the metric that determines the font weight of the text used in status bars and ToolTips for the nonclient area of a nonminimized window.

    public static System.Windows.FontWeight StatusFontWeight { get; }

    Property Value

    • FontWeight

      A font weight.

    Remarks

    Obtain the metric from SPI_GETNONCLIENTMETRICS. See SystemParametersInfo.

    XAML Attribute Usage

    <object property="{ SystemFonts.StatusFontWeight}"/>

  • StatusFontWeightKey

    Gets the ResourceKey for the stem.Windows.SystemFonts.StatusFontWeight* property.

    public static System.Windows.ResourceKey StatusFontWeightKey { get; }

    Property Value

    • ResourceKey

      A resource key.

    Remarks

    XAML Attribute Usage

    <object property="{ { SystemFonts.StatusFontWeightKey}}"/>
